description:
Taurus is a social networking app geared towards multi-tasking and productivity. Using a unique dashboard-and-column system, content is viewed in a way that suits you.

Here are just a few of the features available:

Twitter:
  -  Access your home timeline, mentions, and direct messages.
  -  View trends by location
  -  View user profiles including tweets, followers, following, and favourites.

Facebook:
  -  View your news feed and wall. 
  -  Read and send private messages. 
  -  View Images and videos without leaving the app. 
  -  Like and Comment on your friends' posts.

LinkedIn:
  -  View the latest updates from your connections. 
  -  Reply to, share, or like connections' posts.
  -  Check out the latest posts from your groups.

Google and Youtube:
  -  Search for and play whole playlists on Youtube. 
  -  View and play your history, favorites and saved playlists.
  -  View news feeds and articles using Google Reader.

Full ToodleDo Integration:
  -  Mark or unmark tasks, and modify their details. 
  -  Edit notes and create new ones.

Other great features:
  -  Themes - Personalize your dashboards and columns with a theme of your choice. There are already four to choose from!
  -  Cross-network Posting -  Instantly share links, photos or contents from one service to any of your other services.
  -  Pinboard - Store links, photos and text snippets on the go. The Pinboard can be used from within ANY other application.
  -  Post Popup - Post to networks while viewing content in other applications. No longer will you have to switch app to post a new link or photo.

---

v1.0.1: Interim update primarily to deal with Youtube Playlist Search bug which was completely unusable previously.

Bug fixes:
  -  Youtube Playlist Search now functioning correctly.
  -  Fixed broken icons in Google Reader.
  -  Added Refresh button to FeedReader.
